article_title: National Guardsman Accused of Planning Islamic State Support Pleads Not Guilty
article_text:
CHICAGO—A National Guard soldier who allegedly planned to joinIslamic State and his cousin pleaded not guilty Wednesday to charges of attempting to provide support to the militant group.

Hasan Edmonds, a 22-year-old specialist in the Illinois National Guard, sat still in an orange jumpsuit as a federal judge read him his rights and the prosecutor listed the charge and maximum possible sentence. His cousin, Jonas Edmonds, 29 years...
